actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide individuals a limited exclusion from gross income for interest on deposits in certain savings institutions.

summary.text: Savings Encouragement Act of 1981 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income up to $500 ($1,000 for joint returns) of the interest earned on savings accounts in banks, savings and loan associations, or credit unions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide individuals a limited exclusion from gross income for interest on deposits in certain savings institutions.
